General.Description: Aequi Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. Aequi Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Greenwich, Connecticut.
